meals.name: Quick Protein-Packed Smoothie Bowl
meals.description: A fast and nutritious breakfast bowl with plant-based protein powder, mixed berries, spinach, and topped with nuts and seeds. Ready in 5 minutes.

meals.name: Overnight Chia Protein Pudding
meals.description: Make-ahead breakfast with chia seeds, plant-based milk, protein powder, and fresh fruit. Prep the night before for a quick morning meal.

meals.name: Quick Lentil and Vegetable Curry
meals.description: A fast 20-minute curry with red lentils, mixed vegetables, coconut milk, and spices. High in protein and flavor.

meals.name: Chickpea and Quinoa Power Bowl
meals.description: A protein-rich bowl with roasted chickpeas, quinoa, mixed greens, avocado, and tahini dressing. Ready in 15 minutes using pre-cooked quinoa.

meals.name: Black Bean and Tofu Stir-Fry
meals.description: Quick 15-minute stir-fry with firm tofu, black beans, bell peppers, and broccoli in a savory sauce. High protein and low sugar.
